rev.comment: Stock symbols are in the infobox. They don't need to be the first thing mentioned in the article as well.

'''Google Inc.''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}}, {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], earning revenue from [[AdWords|advertising]] related to its [[Google search|Internet search]], [[Gmail|web-based e-mail]], [[Google Maps|online mapping]], [[Google Apps|office productivity]], [[Orkut|social networking]], and [[YouTube|video sharing]] services as well as selling advertising-free versions of the [[Google Search Appliance|same technologies]]. The Google headquarters, the [[Googleplex]], is located in [[Mountain View, California]]. As of [[June 30]] [[2008]] the company has 19,604 full-time employees.<ref name="q22008results" /> As of [[October 31]], [[2007]], it is the largest American company (by [[market capitalization]]) that is not part of the [[Dow Jones Industrial Average]].<ref>{{cite web
+
